alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northeastern Bay, northwestern Calhoun and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 200 PM CDT... At 109 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Marianna to 11 miles southeast of Vernon. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Bradford, Cottondale, Altha, Alford, Moose Pond, Fountain, Singer Road, Union City, Camps Head, Gainer Spring, Bennett, Youngstown, Star, Porter Lake, Compass Lake, Betts, Orange Hill, Kynesville and Ridgetop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
